Luminous:Balance_Aether_Conduit.NAME: Aether Conduit
Luminous:Balance_Aether_Conduit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Deal an additional !M! damage for each luminous:MagicPower. NL luminous:Balance

Luminous:Balance_Baptism.NAME: Baptism
Luminous:Balance_Baptism.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all luminous:Ender_Power . Deal !D! damage twice times for every exhausted power, Attack more 1 time at last. Exhaust. NL luminous:Balance

Luminous:Balance_Death_Scythe.NAME: Death Scythe
Luminous:Balance_Death_Scythe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage 2 times to all enemy. Plus !M! damage per !Luminous:SecondMagic! damaged. NL luminous:Balance

Luminous:Balance_Ender.NAME: Ender
Luminous:Balance_Ender.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. 150% Damage for Elites and Boss. NL Apply !M! luminous:Ender_Power . NL luminous:Balance

Luminous:Dark_Apocalypse.NAME: Apocalypse
Luminous:Dark_Apocalypse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to All enemies !Luminous:SecondMagic! times. NL [#e60000]Dark[]
Luminous:Dark_Apocalypse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to All enemies !Luminous:SecondMagic! times, NL plus !M! luminous:Pressure_Void. NL [#e60000]Dark[]

Luminous:Dark_Arcane_Pitch.NAME: Arcane Pitch
Luminous:Dark_Arcane_Pitch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain additional !M! luminous:MagicPower this turn. NL [#e60000]Dark[]

Luminous:Dark_Dim_Erosion.NAME: Dim Erosion
Luminous:Dark_Dim_Erosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL [#e60000]Dark[]

Luminous:Dark_Extract.NAME: Extract
Luminous:Dark_Extract.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If target has luminous:Pressure_Void, Remove it and Gain [E] NL [#e60000]Dark[]
Luminous:Dark_Extract.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If target has luminousPressure_Void, Remove it and Gain [E] [E] NL [#e60000]Dark[]

Luminous:Dark_Moonlight_Spear.NAME: Moonlight Spear
Luminous:Dark_Moonlight_Spear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If target has luminous:Pressure_Void, Apply !M! Vulnerable, Gain [E] . NL [#e60000]Dark[]

Luminous:Dark_Morning_Star.NAME: Morning Star
Luminous:Dark_Morning_Star.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If target dead, Gain [E] and draw !M! card(s). NL [#e60000]Dark[]

Luminous:Dark_Raid.NAME: Raid
Luminous:Dark_Raid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, if target's HP isn't full, Apply !M! Weak. NL [#e60000]Dark[]

Luminous:Light_Disperse.NAME: Disperse
Luminous:Light_Disperse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL [#03e3fc]Light[]

Luminous:Light_Gather.NAME: Gather
Luminous:Light_Gather.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain Block as half of damage. NL [#03e3fc]Light[]

Luminous:Light_Glare.NAME: Glare
Luminous:Light_Glare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If target's HP isn't full, Apply 2 luminous:Mark . NL [#03e3fc]Light[]

Luminous:Light_Ray_of_Redemption.NAME: Ray of Redemption
Luminous:Light_Ray_of_Redemption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Receive Heal as 50% of the damage which wasn't be blocked. NL Exhaust. NL [#03e3fc]Light[]

Luminous:Light_Reflection.NAME: Reflection
Luminous:Light_Reflection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to target, plus !Luminous:SecondMagic! random damage. NL ( !M! decrease for each) NL [#03e3fc]Light[]
Luminous:Light_Reflection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to target, plus !Luminous:SecondMagic! random damage. NL [#03e3fc]Light[]

Luminous:Light_Spectral_Light.NAME: Spectral Light
Luminous:Light_Spectral_Light.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies X times. NL [#03e3fc]Light[]
Luminous:Light_Spectral_Light.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies X+1 times. NL [#03e3fc]Light[]

Luminous:Light_Sylvan_Lance.NAME: Sylvan Lance
Luminous:Light_Sylvan_Lance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to random enemy for every card in your hand. NL [#03e3fc]Light[]

Luminous:Light_Track.NAME: Track
Luminous:Light_Track.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply !M! luminous:Mark . NL [#03e3fc]Light[]

Luminous:Accumulation_Luminous.NAME: Accumulation
Luminous:Accumulation_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: End Turn, Gain [E] as remaining next turn.

Luminous:Arcane_Rage_Luminous.NAME: Arcane Rage
Luminous:Arcane_Rage_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Vulnerable. NL Gain [E] [E]. Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Luminous:Armageddon_Luminous.NAME: Armageddon
Luminous:Armageddon_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Stun All monsters for !M! turn(s). NL Exhaust.

Luminous:Blinding_Pillar_Luminous.NAME: Blinding Pillar
Luminous:Blinding_Pillar_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: If target's intent is Attack, Apply !M! Weak.

Luminous:Chase_Spell_Luminous.NAME: Chase Spell
Luminous:Chase_Spell_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Play out the top card of Discard Pile, then Exhaust it. NL Exhaust
Luminous:Chase_Spell_Luminous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play out the top card of Discard Pile, then Exhaust it.

Luminous:Chaos_Field_Luminous.NAME: Chaos Field
Luminous:Chaos_Field_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Balance card to hand, cost 0 for this turn. NL Exhaust.

Luminous:Darks_Surge_Luminous.NAME: Dark Surge
Luminous:Darks_Surge_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: In this turn, Gain !M! Strength while using Attack card. NL Lose that many Strength at end of turn.

Luminous:Date_of_Light_Luminous.NAME: Date of Light
Luminous:Date_of_Light_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: At end of next !M! turn, Deal !Luminous:SecondMagic! damage to All enemies.(Could only play in Balance) NL Exhaust.
Luminous:Date_of_Light_Luminous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL At end of next !M! turn, Deal !Luminous:SecondMagic! damage to All enemies.(Could only play in Balance) NL Exhaust.

Luminous:Erosion_Luminous.NAME: Erosion
Luminous:Erosion_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Lose All Block, Gain !M! Strength per !Luminous:SecondMagic! Block Lose. NL Exhaust.
Luminous:Erosion_Luminous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose All Block, Gain !M! Strength per !Luminous:SecondMagic! Block Lose. NL Exhaust.

Luminous:Fast_Spell_Luminous.NAME: Fast Magic
Luminous:Fast_Spell_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Play out the top card of draw pile immediately.
Luminous:Fast_Spell_Luminous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play out the top card of draw pile immediately.

Luminous:Flash_Blink_Luminous.NAME: Flash Blink
Luminous:Flash_Blink_Luminous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

Luminous:Freud_Wisdom1_Luminous.NAME: Freud's Wisdom
Luminous:Freud_Wisdom1_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Reduce !Luminous:SecondMagic! cost for !M! random cards this turn. Put [#ff9900]Freud's[] [#ff9900]Protection[] onto top of draw pile. Can upgrade multiple times to upgrade derivative cards. NL Exhaust.

Luminous:Freud_Wisdom2_Luminous.NAME: Freud's Protection
Luminous:Freud_Wisdom2_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Put [#ff9900]Freud's[] [#ff9900]Healing[] onto top of draw pile. Exhaust.

Luminous:Freud_Wisdom3_Luminous.NAME: Freud's Healing
Luminous:Freud_Wisdom3_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Put [#ff9900]Freud's[] [#ff9900]Increment[] onto top of draw pile. Exhaust.

Luminous:Freud_Wisdom4_Luminous.NAME: Freud's Increment
Luminous:Freud_Wisdom4_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength, !M! Dexterity. NL Put [#ff9900]Freud's[] [#ff9900]Perseverance[] onto top of draw pile. Exhaust.

Luminous:Freud_Wisdom5_Luminous.NAME: Freud's Perseverance
Luminous:Freud_Wisdom5_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Give additional !M! damage to Boss and Elite. NL Put [#ff9900]Freud's[] [#ff9900]Blessing[] onto top of draw pile. Exhaust.

Luminous:Lights_Protection_Luminous.NAME: Light Protection
Luminous:Lights_Protection_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: In this turn, Gain !M! Block while using Skill card.

Luminous:Hero_Will_Luminous.NAME: Hero's Will
Luminous:Hero_Will_Luminous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Debuff. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Luminous:Magic_Accelerate_Luminous.NAME: Magic Accelerate
Luminous:Magic_Accelerate_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: In next !M! turns, Gain 2 luminous:MagicPower per turn. NL Exhaust.

Luminous:Mirror_Force_Luminous.NAME: Mirror Force
Luminous:Mirror_Force_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: This turn, Reflect damage to All enemies when first attacked. NL Exhaust.
Luminous:Mirror_Force_Luminous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, Reflect damage to All enemies when first attacked.

Luminous:Phantom_Treasure_Luminous.NAME: Phantom's Treasure
Luminous:Phantom_Treasure_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Choose an Attack card to copy, [#00e600]free[] to use it once. NL Exhaust.
Luminous:Phantom_Treasure_Luminous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Chose an Attack card to copy, [#00e600]free[] to use it. NL Exhaust.

Luminous:Reverse_Spell_Luminous.NAME: Reverse Arcane
Luminous:Reverse_Spell_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Exchange the top card of Draw Pile and Discard Pile.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No card in Draw Pile or Discard Pile!

Luminous:Switch_Luminous.NAME: Switch
Luminous:Switch_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Switch between Light and Darks. Gain !B! Block. NL If luminous:MagicPower > !M!, Gain 1 turn luminous:Balance.

Luminous:Sympathy_Luminous.NAME: Sympathy
Luminous:Sympathy_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: In !M! turn(s), NL Gain luminous:MagicPower no matter attack type.

Luminous:Tune_Luminous.NAME: Tune
Luminous:Tune_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, NL Put !Luminous:SecondMagic! card from your hand onto the bottom of your draw pile.

Luminous:Abyss_Heart_Luminous.NAME: Abyss Heart
Luminous:Abyss_Heart_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: At start of turn, if you have debuff, Gain !M! Strength.
Luminous:Abyss_Heart_Luminous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At start of turn, if you have debuff, Gain !M! Strength.

Luminous:Dark_Crescendo_Luminous.NAME: Dark Crescendo
Luminous:Dark_Crescendo_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: When you Gain luminous:MagicPower for !Luminous:SecondMagic! times, Gain !M! Strength.
Luminous:Dark_Crescendo_Luminous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you Gain luminous:MagicPower for !Luminous:SecondMagic! times, Gain !M! Strength.

Luminous:Darkness_Mastery_Luminous.NAME: Darkness Mastery
Luminous:Darkness_Mastery_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! additional Balance power when you arrive Balance.
Luminous:Darkness_Mastery_Luminous.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! additional Balance power when you arrive Balance.

Luminous:Dusk_Guard_Luminous.NAME: Dusk Guard
Luminous:Dusk_Guard_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: At end of your turn, Gain Block according to amount of luminous:MagicPower .

Luminous:Lania_Blessing_Luminous.NAME: Lania Blessing
Luminous:Lania_Blessing_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: At start of turn, Randomly Gain 5 Heal, 10 Block, or 2 Strength.

Luminous:Light_Wash_Luminous.NAME: Talent of Light
Luminous:Light_Wash_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Ignore 6 Block of monsters when Attack.

Luminous:Lunar_Tide_Luminous.NAME: Lunar Tide
Luminous:Lunar_Tide_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: At start of turn, if your HP higher than 70% Max HP, Gain !M! [E]. NL Otherwise, Gain 3 Strength(1 time).

Luminous:Mana_Overload_Luminous.NAME: Mana Overload
Luminous:Mana_Overload_Luminous.DESCRIPTION: Use 2 luminous:MagicPower to deal more damage when attack. NL (Base: !M! )
